title: Systematic Construction of Time-Dependent Hamiltonians for Microwave-Driven Josephson Circuits
summary: Time-dependent electromagnetic drives are fundamental for controlling complex quantum systems, including superconducting Josephson circuits. In these devices, accurate time-dependent Hamiltonian models are imperative for predicting their dynamics and designing high-fidelity quantum operations.
